subject: Horse Racing
Robberies and Thefts
Golf
Memorabilia and Souvenirs
Museums
lead_paragraph: Dressing like a ninja, a thief made off with horse racing and golf memorabilia worth nearly $1 million in a string of museum burglaries in New York and New Jersey, the authorities say.
snippet: Dressing like a ninja, a thief made off with horse racing and golf memorabilia worth nearly $1 million in a string of museum burglaries in New York and New Jersey, the authorities say.
